verses.verse: (A Psalm for Thanksgiving.) Shout<WH7321> joyfully<WH7321> to the Lord,<WH3068> all<WH3605> the earth.<WH776>
Serve<WH5647> the Lord<WH3068> with gladness;<WH8057> Come<WH935> before<WH6440> Him with joyful<WH7445> singing.<WH7445>

Know<WH3045> that the Lord<WH3068> Himself<WH1931> is God;<WH430> It is He who has made<WH6213> us, and not we ourselves;<WH587> [We are] His people<WH5971> and the sheep<WH6629> of His pasture.<WH4830>
Enter<WH935> His gates<WH8179> with thanksgiving,<WH8426> [And] His courts<WH2691> with praise.<WH8416> Give<WH3034> thanks<WH3034> to Him; bless<WH1288> His name.<WH8034>
For the Lord<WH3068> is good;<WH2896> His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting,<WH5769> And His faithfulness<WH530> to all<WH1755> generations.<WH1755>
